title: VILLAGE / ABIGAIL
description: Don't Call Abigail -- a member of the Union of Moribund Alcoholics, who talks about (not calling) Abigail.

dialogueTree.title: Don't Call Abigail: ""Don't call... don't call her..." T..."
dialogueTree.text: "Don't call... don't call her..." The drunk man speaks in his sleep. Drool dribbles from the left side of his mouth and down his jacket lapel.

links.title: You: ""Hey, wake up!""
links.text: "Hey, wake up!"

links.title: Don't Call Abigail: "There's no waking him from his stup..."
links.text: There's no waking him from his stupor. His mind is elsewhere.

links.title: You: "Let him sleep it off. [Leave.]"
links.text: Let him sleep it off. [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Don't Call Abigail: ""Don't call Abigail." The drunk man..."
dialogueTree.text: "Don't call Abigail." The drunk man looks at you with his sad, swollen eyes.

links.title: You: ""Have you seen any women around her..."
links.text: "Have you seen any women around here lately?"

links.title: Don't Call Abigail: ""Abigail?" His voice perks up, then..."
links.text: "Abigail?" His voice perks up, then trails into a string of random babbling. "Abigail, where are you?"

links.title: Don't Call Abigail: ""Don'... don'..." the man stammers,..."
links.text: "Don'... don'..." the man stammers, "don't call..." Slowly, his head nods off to the side and he passes out, tongue dangling from his mouth.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There was little chance he'd be a..."
links.text: "There was little chance he'd be a reliable witness, anyway."

links.title: You: ""Hey, I'm on an important official..."
links.text: "Hey, I'm on an important official investigation, I demand you answer my questions."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There's no use in yelling at drunk..."
links.text: "There's no use in yelling at drunks," the lieutenant interjects. "He's barely holding it together."

links.title: Don't Call Abigail: "The drunk man starts coughing, a re..."
links.text: The drunk man starts coughing, a really disgusting hacking cough.

links.title: Endurance: "He does not sound well at all."
links.text: He does not sound well at all.

links.title: You: ""Who are you? What's your name?""
links.text: "Who are you? What's your name?"

links.title: Don't Call Abigail: "His eyes move around erratically, t..."
links.text: His eyes move around erratically, the look in them hazy and unfocused. "Don't call Abigail," he says.

links.title: You: ""Where am I? What is this place?""
links.text: "Where am I? What is this place?"

links.title: Don't Call Abigail: "The man hiccups, then mumbles somet..."
links.text: The man hiccups, then mumbles something unintelligible.

links.title: You: ""Why shouldn't I call Abigail?""
links.text: "Why shouldn't I call Abigail?"

links.title: Don't Call Abigail: "He snorts and beckons you to lean i..."
links.text: He snorts and beckons you to lean in closer.

links.title: You: "Lean in."
links.text: Lean in.

links.title: Don't Call Abigail: "His breath smells harsh like a toxi..."
links.text: His breath smells harsh like a toxic swamp as he whispers to you: "Don't call Abigail. Don't call Abigail!" He then waves his hand, as if shooing you away.

links.title: You: "Don't lean in."
links.text: Don't lean in.

links.title: Don't Call Abigail: "He waves his hand, as if shooing yo..."
links.text: He waves his hand, as if shooing you away, all the while murmuring something indecipherable.

links.title: You: ""Tell me about your friends." (Poin..."
links.text: "Tell me about your friends." (Point to the others.)

links.title: Don't Call Abigail: "He glares at you. "Don't ya fuckin'..."
links.text: He glares at you. "Don't ya fuckin' call her, hear me." His voice trembles with every word, becoming ever weaker. "Abigail," he whimpers in the end.

links.title: You: "Walk away. [Leave.]"
links.text: Walk away. [Leave.]

links.title: Don't Call Abigail: ""Don't... call Abigail..." he whimp..."
links.text: "Don't... call Abigail..." he whimpers softly, his voice trailing off into nothingness.

dialogueTree.title: Don't Call Abigail: ""Don't call Abigail," grumbles an u..."
dialogueTree.text: "Don't call Abigail," grumbles an unshaven man with a ruddy nose. He narrows his eyes at you as if in recognition, then turns his head away.

links.title: Perception (Smell): "The noxious odour emanating from th..."
links.text: The noxious odour emanating from the drunken man is strong and familiar.

links.title: Don't Call Abigail: ""Don't ya call her, ya hear. Don't..."
links.text: "Don't ya call her, ya hear. Don't call Abigail..."

links.title: You: ""I am the law.""
links.text: "I am the law."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant sighs. "You really d..."
links.text: The lieutenant sighs. "You really don't have to... Besides, he will understand you anyway."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Right, you might have found the on..."
links.text: "Right, you might have found the one person who doesn't know you are the law, given how drunk he is."

links.title: Don't Call Abigail: ""Abigail... oh, Abigail..." He mutt..."
links.text: "Abigail... oh, Abigail..." He mutters while trying to brush something off his extremely dirty trousers. His movements are slow and awkward.

links.title: You: ""Who is Abigail?""
links.text: "Who is Abigail?"

links.title: Don't Call Abigail: "He draws out a disgusting snort, th..."
links.text: He draws out a disgusting snort, then mumbles, waving a finger in your general direction: "Ugh... Abigail... don't ya... fuckin'... call Abigail."

links.title: Suggestion: "Abigail is his wife or girlfriend...."
links.text: Abigail is his wife or girlfriend. Chances are, she's gone. Calling her wouldn't make it any better or worse.

links.title: You: ""I'll call whoever I want, don't te..."
links.text: "I'll call whoever I want, don't tell me what to do."

links.title: Don't Call Abigail: ""Abigail!" He grunts. "Don't... don..."
links.text: "Abigail!" He grunts. "Don't... don't call her." He waves a finger in your general direction.

links.title: Rhetoric: "You're not going to get anything fr..."
links.text: You're not going to get anything from this guy. He's too drunk.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Never thought you'd see such a thin..."
links.text: Never thought you'd see such a thing in your life, but this guy's a little *too* drunk.

links.title: You: ""This is making me uncomfortable."..."
links.text: "This is making me uncomfortable." [Leave.]

links.title: Don't Call Abigail: "The dozing man mumbles something in..."
links.text: The dozing man mumbles something inaudible.
